Description: 
We understand that Thomas may seem shy and anxious at first (especially with men), but with the right training and patience, he has the potential to become a loyal and loving companion. He know lots of cues: sit, stay, come, shake, spin, and leave it! If you're willing to give him a chance, Thomas will reward you with his playful and affectionate personality. Come meet Thomas and see if he's the perfect match for your family.
Breed:
Anatolian Shepherd/Mixed Breed, Large (over 44 lbs fully grown)
Age:
1 year 7 months 5 days
Gender:
Male
Color:
Chestnut/White
Size:
Large
Location:
Dog Kennels
